package.name: ros_led
package.description: ROS 2 Jazzy running in a container on the Arduino UNO Q to control the onboard LED via an RPC bridge between the Qualcomm MPU (Linux) and the STM32 microcontroller. A ROS 2 node subscribes to a boolean topic and triggers an RPC call to the MCU, enabling end-to-end ROS-native LED control on the UNO Q.
